title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 160.5 - Hours of public inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 160.5 - Hours of public inspection

State Regulations

The Department of Motor Vehicles shall accept requests for
public access to records and produce records between the hours of 8:30 a.m. and
4:30 p.m. on any business day. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
160.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
